mapper.sql:
where 1 = 1 and goods.state = 1
and goods.name like CONCAT('%',#{obj.name},'%')
and goods.content like CONCAT('%',#{obj.content},'%')
and goods.code like CONCAT('%',#{obj.code},'%')
and (goods.typeId = #{obj.typeId} or type.pid = #{obj.typeId})
and (goods.name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or goods.exp_name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or goods.quantity like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or goods.content like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or goods.code like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or brand.name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or goods.store like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
mapper.select: select goods.id as id,goods.name as name,goods.exp_name as exp_name,goods.typeId as typeId,goods.top as top, goods.quantity as quantity,goods.content as content,goods.code as code,goods.searchval as searchval, goods.brandId as brandId,goods.ids as ids,brand.name as brandName,type.name as typename, goods.store as store,goods.state as state,type.pid as pid from t_goods as goods left join t_goods_brand as brand on goods.brandId = brand.id left join t_goods_type as type on goods.typeId = type.id
select count(goods.id) from t_goods as goods left join t_goods_brand as brand on goods.brandId = brand.id left join t_goods_type as type on goods.typeId = type.id

select goods.id as id,goods.name as name,goods.exp_name as exp_name,goods.typeId as typeId,goods.top as top, goods.quantity as quantity,goods.content as content,goods.code as code,goods.searchval as searchval, goods.brandId as brandId,goods.ids as ids,brand.name as brandName,type.name as typename,goods.store as store, pro.name as proname,pro.id as proId,goods.state as state from t_goods as goods left join t_goods_brand as brand on goods.brandId = brand.id left join t_goods_type as type on goods.typeId = type.Id left join t_goods_pro as pro on pro.typeId = type.id where goods.state = 1 and goods.id = #{goodsId} and concat(',',goods.ids,',') like CONCAT('%,',pro.id,',%')
mapper.update: update t_goods set state = 0 where id in (${ids})
update t_goods set top = #{top} where id = #{id}
update t_goods set content = #{content} where id = #{id}
update t_goods set quantity = (#{quantity}+t_goods.quantity) where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_goods left join (select sku.goodsid, sku.price as price, image.url from (select * from (select * from t_goods_sku order by goodsid, price) as t group by t.goodsid) as sku left join t_goods_image as image on sku.id = image.skuid) as g on t_goods.id = g.goodsid where state = 1 order by top desc, id desc limit #{pageStart},#{num}

select * from t_goods left join (select sku.goodsid, sku.price as price, image.url from (select * from (select * from t_goods_sku order by goodsid, price) as t group by t.goodsid) as sku left join t_goods_image as image on sku.id = image.skuid) as g on t_goods.id = g.goodsid
where state = 1 ORDER BY t_goods.id DESC
where state = 1 ORDER BY t_goods.num DESC
where state = 1 and t_goods.quantity > 0 ORDER BY t_goods.id DESC
where state = 1 and t_goods.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY t_goods.id DESC
where state = 1 and t_goods.typeid = #{typeId} ORDER BY t_goods.id DESC
limit #{pageStart},#{num}

select * from t_goods left join (select sku.goodsid, sku.price as price, image.url from (select * from (select * from t_goods_sku order by goodsid, price) as t group by t.goodsid) as sku left join t_goods_image as image on sku.id = image.skuid) as g on t_goods.id = g.goodsid where t_goods.id = #{goodsId}

select * from t_goods left join (select sku.goodsid, sku.price as price, image.url from (select * from (select * from t_goods_sku order by goodsid desc, price desc) as t group by t.goodsid) as sku left join t_goods_image as image on sku.id = image.skuid) as g on t_goods.id = g.goodsid where t_goods.id = #{goodsId}
mapper.update: update t_goods set num = #{num} where id = #{id}
